tweets.text: Set low in the landscape, the Colne Valley Viaduct #design is inspired by a stone skipping across water. It also enables views and minimises the viaduct’s footprint. We're working with Affinity Water & @EnvAgency to monitor water quality during building: https://t.co/buIn6X4FVl https://t.co/DARevhgBDy

urls.title: HS2 begins work on UK’s longest rail viaduct
urls.description: HS2 began work this week on the UK’s longest railway bridge, with an expert team of ground engineers sinking the first of almost 300 piles that will form the foundations for the Colne Valley Viaduct.

Sanway, #Byfleet flood alleviation.
Session 1: Saturday 13 March 2021 from 10:30am to 12 noon
Session 2: Wednesday 17 March 2021 from 7pm to 8:30pm
Join the team for a virtual event on the scheme - 
https://t.co/ilwXQUJTxn
#surreyhighways #flooding @EnvAgencySE https://t.co/OjedI4giJr

urls.title: Sanway-Byfleet Flood Alleviation Scheme Virtual Event
urls.description: This is an opportunity for you to have your say on our proposals for the scheme. The event is run by the Environment Agency in partnership with Woking Borough Council and Surrey County Council. Trial Zoom session, for you to practise using Zoom ahead of the virtual event sessions: Thursday 11 March (1:30pm to 2:00pm) . Sign up to one of the two free virtual events. You only need to attend one event: Saturday 13 March (10:30am to 12:00pm) or Wednesday 17 March (7:00pm to 8:30pm).
